languages.text: Each time an extra turn is granted to an ally in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm's area, its Overseer receives +3 FEL and +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}% bonus damage until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Each time an extra turn is granted to an ally in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm's area, its Overseer receives +3 FEL and +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}% bonus damage until the end of combat. Stacks.

languages.text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is granted in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, until the end of combat, its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and has their damage increased by +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is granted in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, until the end of combat, its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and has their damage increased by +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%. Stacks.

Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is granted in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, until the end of combat, its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and has their damage increased by +{uip|Bonus Damage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%. Stacks.

Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is granted in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, until the end of combat, its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and has their damage increased by +{uip|Bonus Damage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%. Stacks.

languages.text: Cada vez que se otorgue un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} en un radio de 4 casillas alrededor del enjambre de servocráneos, hasta el final del combate su {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} gana +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} y el daño que inflige aumenta un +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7} %. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is granted in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, until the end of combat, its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and has their damage increased by +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que se otorgue un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} en un radio de 4 casillas alrededor del enjambre de servocráneos, hasta el final del combate su {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} gana +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} y el daño que inflige aumenta un +{uip|Bonus Damage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7} %. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: 每当伺服头骨集群距离4格内的盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}都会提高3点，造成的伤害提高{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is granted in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, until the end of combat, its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and has their damage increased by +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当伺服头骨集群距离4格内的盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}都会提高3点，造成的伤害提高{uip|Bonus Damage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Lorsqu'un personnage se trouvant dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}, son {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} gagne +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et bénéficie de dégâts augmentés de +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is granted in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, until the end of combat, its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and has their damage increased by +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un personnage se trouvant dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}, son {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} gagne +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et bénéficie de dégâts augmentés de +{uip|Bonus Damage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

languages.text: Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanıldığında sürünün {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen'i{/g} +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} niteliği kazanır ve vereceği hasar +%{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7} artar. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is granted in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, until the end of combat, its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and has their damage increased by +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanıldığında sürünün {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen'i{/g} +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} niteliği kazanır ve vereceği hasar +%{uip|Bonus Damage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7} artar. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

languages.text: Когда союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов, его {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} получает +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}% к наносимому урону. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is granted in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, until the end of combat, its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and has their damage increased by +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Когда союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов, его {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} получает +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}% к наносимому урону. Эффект суммируется.

Когда союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов, его {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} получает +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}% к наносимому урону. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 戦闘終了時まで、サーボ・スカル・スウォームの周囲半径4セルで{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g} が付与されるたび、その{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g} は+3{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} を獲得し、そのダメージは+{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%増加する。スタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is granted in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, until the end of combat, its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and has their damage increased by +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了時まで、サーボ・スカル・スウォームの周囲半径4セルで{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g} が付与されるたび、その{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}オーバーサー{/g} は+3{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}フェローシップ{/g} を獲得し、そのダメージは+{uip|Bonus Damage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%増加する。スタックする。

languages.text: Wird in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm ein {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} gewährt, erhält sein {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und verursacht +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7} % Schaden. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is granted in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, until the end of combat, its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and has their damage increased by +{uip|BonusDamage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7}%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Wird in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm ein {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} gewährt, erhält sein {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und verursacht +{uip|Bonus Damage|94f07339271446e1bd2ee4b667d3bfc7} % Schaden.
